name: ButtonEvent
description: Describes the state of a button

content.name: Enter
content.description: the mouse cursor has entered the area of the button

content.name: Leave
content.description: the mouse cursor has left the area of the button

content.name: Press
content.description: a mouse button has been pressed over the button

content.name: Release
content.description: a mouse button has been released over the button

content.name: PressRelease
content.description: a mouse button has been pressed and then released over the button

content.name: DoublePressRelease
content.description: a mouse button has been pressed and then released twice over the button in quick succession

content.name: RollOn
content.description: the mouse cursor has entered the area of the button while a mouse button was pressed

content.name: RollOff
content.description: the mouse cursor has left the area of the button while a mouse button was pressed
